pullRequest.title: [BEAM-10637] fix: test stream service start/stop
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed the start/stop logic so that a controller:

can only be started/stopped once;
can only be stopped when is started while never stopped before;
does not hang indefinitely but noop for redundant or invalid start/stop calls.

 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.

@@ -50,9 +52,17 @@ def __init__(self, reader, endpoint=None, exception_handler=None):
       self._exception_handler = lambda _: False
 
   def start(self):
-    self._server.start()
+    # A server can only be started if never started and never stopped before.
+    if not self._server_started and not self._server_stopped:
+      self._server_started = True
+      self._server.start()
 
   def stop(self):
+    # A server can only be stopped if already started and never stopped before.
+    if not self._server_started or self._server_stopped:

commit.message: Normalize the if statements in a consistent way.
